newsitem.title: USA: Sun International unit amends tender offer.
newsitem.headline: Sun International unit amends tender offer.

text.p: Sun International Hotels Ltd said on Friday one of its unit amended its offer for two series of mortgage notes.

Sun International said its Resorts International Hotel Financing Inc unit "amended its offer to purchase for cash all of its outstanding $125 million principal amount of 11 percent mortgage notes due 2003, and $35 million principal amount of 11-3/8 percent junior mortgage notes due 2004."
Following the amendment, Resorts International will pay on the securities "a yield ... equal to the sum of the comparable Treasury yield and 50 basis points plus accrued interests"
Sun International also said the comparable Treasury yield was calculated at 5.83 percent.
The first call date for the securities is May 3, 1999.
Sun International also said "the offer and consent solicitations will expire at the end of business day on March 10 "unless such date is extended by Resorts International."
